message.content:
We start by extracting the required numbers from the statements.

──────────────────────────────
1. Free Cash Flow (FCF)

• From the Cash Flow statement:
 – Net Cash Flow from Operating Activities = –18,924,462.44  
 – Purchase of Fixed Assets (CapEx) = 2,670,827.47

We use the formula:
  FCF = Operating Cash Flow – Capital Expenditure  
    = (–18,924,462.44) – 2,670,827.47  
    = –21,595,289.91

──────────────────────────────
2. Return on Assets (ROA)

• Net Profit from the Income Statement = 1,842,166.21  
• Total Assets:
  Initial Total Assets = 28,000,000.00  
  Ending Total Assets = 30,858,088.75  
• Compute the average total assets:
  Average Total Assets = (28,000,000.00 + 30,858,088.75) / 2  
              = 58,858,088.75 / 2  
              = 29,429,044.38 (approximately)

Now, ROA = (Net Profit / Average Total Assets) × 100  
  = (1,842,166.21 / 29,429,044.38) × 100  
  ≈ 6.26%

──────────────────────────────
3. Return on Equity (ROE)

• Total Owner's Equity:
  Initial Owner's Equity = 28,000,000.00  
  Ending Owner's Equity = 29,842,166.21  
• Average Owner’s Equity = (28,000,000.00 + 29,842,166.21) / 2  
          = 57,842,166.21 / 2  
          ≈ 28,921,083.11

ROE = (Net Profit / Average Owner’s Equity) × 100  
  = (1,842,166.21 / 28,921,083.11) × 100  
  ≈ 6.37%

──────────────────────────────
4. Operating Cash Flow to Net Income Ratio

This ratio is given by:
  Ratio = Operating Cash Flow / Net Profit  
Using:
  Operating Cash Flow = –18,924,462.44  
  Net Profit = 1,842,166.21  
  Ratio = –18,924,462.44 / 1,842,166.21  
  ≈ –10.27

──────────────────────────────
5. Net Profit Margin

Net Profit Margin = (Net Profit / Total Revenue) × 100  
• Net Profit = 1,842,166.21  
• Total Revenue (from income statement) = 20,318,450.67  
  Margin = (1,842,166.21 / 20,318,450.67) × 100  
  ≈ 9.07%

──────────────────────────────
6. Gross Profit Margin

Gross Profit Margin = (Gross Profit / Total Revenue) × 100  
• Gross Profit = 5,718,450.67  
• Total Revenue = 20,318,450.67  
  Margin = (5,718,450.67 / 20,318,450.67) × 100  
  ≈ 28.13%

──────────────────────────────
Thus, our final answers in JSON format are:

{
  "solution": {
    "Free Cash Flow (FCF)": "-21595289.91",
    "Return on Assets (ROA)": "6.26%",
    "Return on Equity (ROE)": "6.37%",
    "Operating Cash Flow to Net Income Ratio": "-10.27",
    "Net Profit Margin": "9.07%",
    "Gross Profit Margin": "28.13%"
  }
}
